episodes.title: The Hatbox
episodes.plot: A college student tries to make the police believe that a professor has murdered his missing wife.

episodes.title: Bang! You're Dead
episodes.plot: A 5-year-old boy finds his uncle's revolver, partially loads it with bullets, and plays with it in public, unaware of its deadly power.

episodes.title: Maria
episodes.plot: While drunk, Leo Thorby buys what he thinks is a chimp. His wife Carol is outraged when she finds out he spent $500 and wants him to get his money back. Both of them are shocked to find out that the chimp is actually a woman, Maria, in a monkey suit, and Leo thinks he has found the perfect circus act. Maria can sketch but only draws what she sees, and when Leo sees a sketch of his wife kissing the lion tamer, he immediately jumps to conclusions. Little does he realize it's all part of Maria's plan to get rid of Carol. When he then gets rid of Maria, she plots her own ...

episodes.title: Cop for a Day
episodes.plot: When a young woman witnesses two men rob and kill a bank messenger, one of the men devises a plan to silence her.

episodes.title: Keep Me Company
episodes.plot: A husband who works late continuously neglects his pretty wife's need for companionship, inadvertently bringing about an unwanted police presence.

episodes.title: Beta Delta Gamma
episodes.plot: A college fraternity drugs and makes up one of their members to look as if he is dead, then lead another unsuspecting member into believing he killed him.

episodes.title: You Can't Be a Little Girl All Your Life
episodes.plot: A woman beaten by an unknown attacker comes under great pressure by her husband and the police to identify a suspect.

episodes.title: The Old Pro
episodes.plot: A retired hit man being blackmailed finds out in his profession, he has to keep on killing to protect his wife and to survive.

episodes.title: I Spy
episodes.plot: A London private detective trying to find evidence that a sweet, gentle, older woman is cheating on her separated husband, falls in love with her.

episodes.title: Services Rendered
episodes.plot: A man can't remember who he is, but has a $1000 bill and an address of a doctor.

episodes.title: The Right Kind of Medicine
episodes.plot: A wounded killer of a policeman rushes to get his prescription of painkiller filled, and a big mistake is made.

episodes.title: A Jury of Her Peers
episodes.plot: An old woman is suspected of murdering her mentally cruel husband, as her childhood girlfriend tries to cover up evidence against her.

episodes.title: The Silk Petticoat
episodes.plot: In 1817 London, a silk petticoat belonging to the first wife of a newly remarried husband reveals him to be a very evil man.

episodes.title: Bad Actor
episodes.plot: An alcoholic actor strangles his friend who won his part in a play, and then tries an unusual way to try to dispose of his body.

episodes.title: The Door Without a Key
episodes.plot: A man goes to a police station claiming memory loss, followed by a boy who says he was accidentally left behind by his father, but the desk sergeant is suspicious of both their stories.

episodes.title: The Case of M.J.H.
episodes.plot: A psychiatrist's secretary falls for a shady man who pressures her to steal files from her office.

episodes.title: The Faith of Aaron Menefee
episodes.plot: Aaron is a garage mechanic who becomes a devotee of a faith healer after he is apparently cured of an ulcer. The healer persuades Aaron to become his chauffeur and he becomes part of the tour. But a questionable man seeks a major healing.

episodes.title: The Woman Who Wanted to Live
episodes.plot: When a woman is forced by a murderer to drive him to safety, she deliberately passes up chances to escape.

episodes.title: Strange Miracle
episodes.plot: A man dares to try and fake a miracle, after pretending to be paralyzed to get insurance money.

episodes.title: The Test
episodes.plot: A lawyer defending a 17-year-old in his stabbing murder trial, wants to use a controversial chemical test that would show if the weapon ever had blood on it.

episodes.title: Burglar Proof
episodes.plot: A paroled safe cracker is hired by a safe company to try and break open one of their safes publicly, and get the 50,000-dollar reward inside.

episodes.title: The Big Score
episodes.plot: A babysitter and her gang kill and rob her employer of 32,000 dollars, unaware that it belongs to a deadly criminal syndicate.

episodes.title: Profit-Sharing Plan
episodes.plot: A retiring office worker plots with his wife to steal money from the company's vault, but apparently unknown to her, he is planning to flee with his mistress.

episodes.title: Apex
episodes.plot: A man's attractive mistress tells him she will handle the killing of his wife, but he wants to hire someone to do it, and a miscommunication results.

episodes.title: The Last Remains
episodes.plot: Amos Duff is a mortician whose business is failing. The bills are piling up and Amos laments the fact that he has never sold his top-of-the-line 'class A' funeral. He does finally get a client when Marvin Foley makes arrangements for his business partner's funeral. Supposedly, the partner was killed in a car accident but Amos discovers a bullet wound. Foley agrees to buy the 'class A' funeral provided Amos cremates the body but after several months has yet to settle his final account for the funeral. With the body cremated Foley refuses to pay but Amos reports the ...

episodes.title: Ten O'Clock Tiger
episodes.plot: A boxing manager risks his fighter's health by increasing the dosage of a secret energy formula he has been injecting him with.

episodes.title: Act of Faith
episodes.plot: Ralston Temple is a successful novelist who receives a letter from struggling writer Alan Chatterton asking him for comments on the first three chapters of his book. Temple invites him to his apartment and Chatterton asks him for a loan of $40 per week for six months to allow him to finish his novel. Over time, the loans grow larger and Temple has yet to see anything of the novel. At a restaurant one evening, Temple sees Chatterton entertaining a group of friends and learns that he is a regular patron. Thinking he has been swindled, Temple throws him out. Only later ...

episodes.title: The Kerry Blue
episodes.plot: A man is devoted to his old, unwell Kerry Blue terrier. Sadly the dog dies while he's out of town. Convinced his wife buried his beloved Annie alive (out of jealousy), he sets out to make her pay - but has his blind rage made him careless?

episodes.title: The Matched Pearl
episodes.plot: Laurent Dubois is a jeweler who manages to sell a magnificent black pearl for $4000. Turns out the buyer's wife doesn't know what to do with only one pearl and insists that they find another. Dubois returns to the pearl's original owner, Captain McCabe, to see if he can find another. McCabe feels that he was cheated on the first deal and he refuses Dubois' offer to double the original price if he can find a second pearl. Dubois eventually gets the pearl and a bit of a surprise as well.

episodes.title: What Frightened You, Fred?
episodes.plot: Fred Riordan is an ex-con who is re-arrested less than 48 hours after his release on parole. He served four years for robbery and on his release, seems like a mild-mannered man who is intent on making a go of it. He recounts to the warden and prison psychiatrist the events during his two days of freedom as they try to determine what may have caused him to get drunk and break up a bar in his old neighborhood. The psychiatrist is convinced that something in the outside world frightened him and probes to determine exactly what that was. Little do they know that there is ...

episodes.title: Most Likely to Succeed
episodes.plot: A seemingly poor man who was supreme in his college class, gets a servant's job from a rich former classmate, where he finds he makes unlawful tax deals, and should be stopped.

episodes.title: Victim Four
episodes.plot: A man searches for his brain-injured wife who has to walk home from work nightly, in the midst of a serial killer.

episodes.title: The Opportunity
episodes.plot: Paul Devore is an unhappily married department store manager whose wealthy wife loathes him and refuses to divorce him, unwilling to give him half of her assets as community property. He blackmails a thirty-something shoplifter into coming to his house the following Sunday evening. Assuming he was going to force her to have sex, she is surprised to find the master bedroom ransacked and all of the valuables missing. She realizes Devore has staged a robbery and all he wants the shoplifter to do is tie him to the bed to make it look like a robbery. But what will Mrs. ...

episodes.title: The Twelve Hour Caper
episodes.plot: Herbert Wiggam has been the assistant cashier at his securities trading firm for 11 years. He has always been a loyal employee but things may be changing. He's advised by his boss that he will not be getting the head cashier position as that will be going to another employee, who just happens to be his wife's favorite nephew. Wiggam goes ahead with an elaborate plan to steal $500,000 in bearer bonds that are scheduled for delivery late on a Friday afternoon. He's planned everything down to the minute - but has he forgotten one important factor?

episodes.title: The Children of Alda Nuova
episodes.plot: Frankie Fane is an American who has been in Rome for about six weeks and is starting to get bored. He hasn't picked up much of the language, and has visited most of the tourist sites in Rome itself. A fellow American suggests that he rent a car and visit some old ruins just a short drive from the city. When he gets there he finds the villagers unfriendly, and a large group of teenagers that constantly follow him around. He quickly realizes that he may be in trouble, but it may also be the case that he gets what he deserves.

episodes.title: First Class Honeymoon
episodes.plot: Edward Gibson is newly divorced and a very happy man. He's less happy when he learns that his ex-wife Gloria commissioned a portrait of herself for $2500. He refuses to pay and asks his friend Carl, who's now seeing his ex-wife, to buy the painting. Carl has something else in mind: he offers to marry Gloria, for a price.

episodes.title: The Big Kick
episodes.plot: Ken is a square university professor who likes hanging around with a group of beatniks. At a party he meets Judy who is down and out and can't buy food, let alone pay the rent. Urged on by her boyfriend Mitch, Judy agrees to go out on a date with Ken in the hopes of getting some money out of him.

episodes.title: Where Beauty Lies
episodes.plot: Caroline has an uncanny infatuation with her brother and is jealous whenever he spends time away from her.

episodes.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
episodes.plot: A magician takes a simple-minded runaway under his wing. But the magician's wife has a sinister idea for the easily manipulated young man.
